thread.title: Grand Slam, French Open Men's Doubles Seeds Progress

title: Grand Slam, French Open Men's Doubles Seeds Progress
text: May 31, 2018 / 5:40 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago UPDATE 3-Grand Slam, French Open Men's Doubles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 5 Min Read May 31 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the Grand Slam, French Open Men's Doubles matches on Thursday .. Seeds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score 1 Lukasz Kubot (POL) and Marcelo Melo (BRA) 2nd to play Roberto Carballes Baena (start 15:00) (ESP) and Guillermo Garcia-Lopez (ESP) 1st won Marco Cecchinato (ITA) and 6-4 7-5 Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 2 Oliver Marach (AUT) and Mate Pavic (CRO) 2nd to play Yuki Bhambri (IND) and Divij (start 09:00) Sharan (IND) 1st won Sander Arends (NED) and Adil 6-2 6-2 Shamasdin (CAN) 3 Henri Kontinen (FIN) and John Peers (AUS) 3rd to play Daniele Bracciali (ITA) and (start 08:00) Andreas Seppi (ITA) 2nd won Mirza Basic (BIH) and Damir 6-1 6-2 Dzumhur (BIH) 1st won Ilya Ivashka (BLR) and Karen 6-3 6-2 Khachanov (RUS) 4 Jamie Murray (GBR) and Bruno Soares (BRA) 2nd to play Maximo Gonzalez (ARG) and (start 17:00) Nicolas Jarry (CHI) 1st won Dusan Lajovic (SRB) and 6-1 7-5 Florian Mayer (GER) 5 Juan Sebastian Cabal (COL) and Robert Farah (COL) 2nd to play Guido Pella (ARG) and Diego (start 13:00) Schwartzman (ARG) 1st won Max Mirnyi (BLR) and Philipp 7-6(3) 7-6(4) Oswald (AUT) 6 Pierre-Hugues Herbert (FRA) and Nicolas Mahut (FRA) 2nd to play Robin Haase (NED) and Matwe (start 17:00) Middelkoop (NED) 1st won Robert Lindstedt (SWE) and 6-4 3-6 7-6(6) Marcin Matkowski (POL) 7 Aisam-Ul-Haq Qureshi (PAK) and Jean-Julien Rojer (AHO) 1st lost Evgeny Donskoy (RUS) and 6-7(2) 7-6(5) 6-4 Miguel Angel Reyes-Varela (MEX) 8 Nikola Mektic (CRO) and Alexander Peya (AUT) 2nd to play Nikoloz Basilashvili (GEO) (start 09:00) and John Millman (AUS) 1st won Dominic Inglot (GBR) and 6-4 6-3 Franko Skugor (CRO) 9 Ivan Dodig (CRO) and Rajeev Ram (USA) 2nd lost Wesley
